group_1.textRight: Jeez! Big Sis!@I told you I'd give you the assist!
That's why you're always getting decked;@you keep jumping into stuff like that!
We're playing co-op!@Why won't you work with me?!

group_1.textLeft: Fuckin' hell...@Juri the Great's not cut out for zombie games!
They don't hit hard, and they die fast, but they@keep gettin' back up when you beat 'em!
Then there's so many enemies swarmin' the place@that it's hard to make out what's goin' on.

group_1.textRight: Nah, those are lame excuses.@I'm pretty sure you're just a scrub, Juri.
Like, didn't you lose a game to Yuna once?
This is a no-burn zone, see!
Yeah!@You know we're in Yuna's house, right?!
But anyway, it's rare to see you two playing@a co-op game together.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yeah, I couldn't clear this one by myself.

group_1.narration: The Halloween Event is now underway!@Get a jack-o-lantern costume as a reward@for clearing high-difficulty quests!

group_1.textRight: Ooh, I see. Halloween's here already, huh?
Out of curiosity...
Where does the "jack" in "jack-o-lantern"@come from, anyway?

group_1.textLeft: Eh? It's from some kinda folktale or@somethin', ain't it?

group_1.textRight: I know this one~.
I mean... Only vaguely, since I heard about it@online, but still~.
A cunning man named Jack tricked the Devil@who came to take his soul.
I guess it's basically a legend about how to avoid@having your soul stolen away~?
In the end, he made the Devil promise to never@come and steal it again.
Woah, Jack sounds pretty cool.@I can't believe he outsmarted a demon.
Does that mean he became immortal?

group_1.textLeft: Mm, that's actually a point in the story~.

group_1.narration: "Eventually, Jack died of old age, but Heaven@wouldn't let him in because of all the lies he told,@so he had no choice but to go to Hell...@Except once he got there, he met the very same@Devil he'd deceived."

"Jack tried to get in, but the Devil was like,@"Well, I promised not to take your soul~."@Which meant he couldn't go anywhere now.@He was left to roam back and forth between@Heaven and Hell...in total darkness..."
"...But the Devil took pity on him and gave him fire,@and Jack carved himself a turnip to use as a lantern.@He's wandered endlessly ever since,@with only its light to guide him."

group_1.textLeft: ...Something like that, anyway.@There are a bunch of different versions of the story.

group_1.textRight: Huh, talk about spooky...@Hey, why'd he carve a turnip instead of a pumpkin?

group_1.textLeft: I heard pumpkins only became mainstream once@they were easier to get ahold of.
It sucks that this happened to Jack, but, well...@It's his own fault for being a liar, isn't it~?
Even though the Devil's the Devil and all,@you could say he's surprisingly good-natured...

group_1.textRight: ...But, see, I still feel bad for Jack if he's@stuck wanderin' around forever.

group_1.textLeft: The sound of the door opening means...@[chara:102201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102201:cheek_1][chara:102201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:102201:lipSynch_1]Yuna is back!
You can tell by the noise alone...?@That's nuts, Horse.
Hm? It sounds like she's running.@That's weird...she doesn't usually do that...

group_1.textRight: I've got a sinking feeling about this...
I heard that they're going to begin construction@right above the catacombs...!
